name: [HELPERS] Test Data
description: Centralized test case store for workflow testing. Call this workflow with { workflow: 'WorkflowName', testCase: 'test-id', testData: {...} } to get test input data. The CLI passes testData directly, so file loading is not needed.

nodes.name: When Executed by Another Workflow
nodes.notes:
Input:
- workflow: Name of the workflow (e.g., 'TelegramContextScout')
- testCase: ID of the test case (e.g., 'contact-rag')
- testData: Test data object (passed directly from CLI)

nodes.name: Test Cases
